mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_token (create_time, is_logout, gmt_modified, gmt_expiry, local_token, user_uuid) VALUES (#{create_time}, #{is_logout}, #{gmt_modified}, #{gmt_expiry}, #{local_token}, #{user_uuid})
mapper.select: SELECT u.name, t.access_token FROM c_order o, users u, c_token t WHERE u.uuid = o.sender_user_uuid AND u.uuid = t.user_uuid AND o.id = #{order_id}
SELECT users.* FROM c_token, users WHERE users.uuid = c_token.user_uuid AND c_token.local_token = #{token}
